// ** English **//

* Year: 2007
* Gender: Lesbo
* Length: 600 minutes
* Translation: Not required (English Subtitles)
* Directed by: Viv Thomas
* Resolution: 640x464 4:3
* Total Size: 6.89 GB

* Starring:

   Adel, Lolita, Gina B, Stella Stevens, Peaches, Eve Angel, Jamie, Sophie Moone Ella, Anouska, Petra, Henrietta, Sandra Shine, Jo, Lisa, Sandy, Vera

* Description:

   An unmissable collector's edition of an unsurpassable lesbian trilogy.
   All three films have enjoyed huge critical success since the first one was released in 2003.
   Now for the first time, they have been remastered, and re-released in this beautiful box-set edition, with over 160 minutes of bonus material, included unseen footage, outtakes, and two amazing bonus scenes, exclusive to this box set.
